definitions.definition: A major repair , renovation , or revision .
examples: The engine required a complete overhaul to run properly.

definitions.definition: The process after the fire appears extinguished in which the firefighters search the structure for signs of hot spots that may cause the structure to reignite.

main_definition: A major repair , renovation , or revision .
secondary_definitions: ( firefighting ) The process after the fire appears extinguished in which the firefighters search the structure for signs of hot spots that may cause the structure to reignite.
